REBATE MANAGEMENT
Learn About Rebate Management and Ship and Debit Process Management

Understand the capabilities of Rebate Management and Ship and Debit Process Management and review what business objectives can be achieved with each feature. Explore the different workflows and data models for Rebate Management and Ship and Debit Process Management. Learn about key roles and terms in Rebate Management and Ship and Debit Process Management.

Comparison of Rebate Management and Ship and Debit Process Management
Use Rebate Management to give monetary incentives to partners who meet an agreed-upon sales target and inspire deeper loyalty and drive the desired channel purchasing behavior. Use Ship and Debit Process Management to create effective ship and debit incentives to compensate partners who price products competitively for end-customers.
Learn About Rebate Management
Review the features of Rebate Management. See the overall workflow for program management and payout calculation. Explore the data model for Rebate Management.
Learn About Ship and Debit Process Management
Learn about the capabilities of Ship and Debit Process Management. Understand the end-to-end workflow of implementing and using its features. Explore the data model for Ship and Debit Process Management.
Get Your Own Trial Org for Rebate Management
Get hands-on experience with Rebate Management features through proof-of-concept and guided self-exploration for 30 days via a trial org.
Key Roles in Rebate Management and Ship and Debit Process Management
Rebate Management users include admins, rebate program managers, partner users, key account managers, ship and debit claims analysts, and the finance team. Admins set up and configure features. Rebate program managers design the rebate programs, ship and debit programs, and their incentives based on requirements provided by sales and finance. Partner users are beneficiaries of rebate and ship and debit programs and enroll in programs to maximize their profits by gaining the best incentives. Key account managers craft incentives for their accounts within the sales process to increase revenue. Ship and debit claims analysts validate ship and debit claims and review ship and debit payouts. The finance team tracks payments and approvals of payments and incentives, helps with audits, and maintains the book of business.
